faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our plans

hosting.question: What's included in hosting?
hosting.answer: Hosting includes server space, SSL domain, daily backups, and sufficient bandwidth for normal traffic. After the first year, you can renew or migrate to your own hosting.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan later?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. You only pay the prorated difference. We also offer downgrades at the end of the billing period.

moreFeatures.question: What if I need more pages or features?
moreFeatures.answer: We can add additional pages or features to any plan. We'll send you a custom quote based on your specific needs.

sourceCode.question: Do you include the source code?
sourceCode.answer: Yes, all our plans include the complete source code and intellectual property rights of the developed project.

guarantee.question: Do you offer a guarantee?
guarantee.answer: We offer a 30-day guarantee after delivery. If you're not satisfied, we'll work until you are or refund your money.

payment.question: What's the payment process?
payment.answer: We request 50% at project start and 50% upon completion. For large projects, we can split into milestones. We accept transfers, cards, and PayPal.

training.question: Do you provide training for the system?
training.answer: Yes, all plans include training for the admin panel. Professional and Enterprise plans include more extensive training sessions.

technologies.question: What technologies do you use?
technologies.answer: We use modern, proven technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS. We choose the best technology based on each project's needs.

customPlan.title: Need a custom plan?
customPlan.subtitle: Contact us for a tailored quote according to your specific needs

hero.title: We Transform Ideas into Digital Reality
hero.subtitle: We are a team passionate about technology, dedicated to creating innovative solutions that drive our clients' success

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: At KopTup, our mission is to empower businesses through innovative and customized technological solutions. We believe that technology should be accessible, efficient and scalable for everyone.
mission.text2: We specialize in turning complex challenges into elegant solutions, combining creativity with technical excellence to deliver products that not only meet but exceed expectations.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every decision and project we undertake

innovation.title: Constant Innovation
innovation.description: We adopt the latest technologies and methodologies to offer cutting-edge solutions.

excellence.title: Passion for Excellence
excellence.description: Every project is an opportunity to exceed expectations and create exceptional products.

creativity.title: Limitless Creativity
creativity.description: We think outside the box to solve complex problems with elegant solutions.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: Clear, honest and constant communication at every stage of the project.

clientFirst.title: Client at the Center
clientFirst.description: Your success is our success. We work as an extension of your team.

results.title: Measurable Results
results.description: We focus on delivering real value and demonstrable ROI in every project.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate professionals with experience in cutting-edge technologies

ronald.name: Ronald Cipagauta
ronald.description: Full Stack developer with expertise in frontend, backend, and AI integration. Specialized in building scalable solutions with React, Node.js, and OpenAI.

johan.name: Johan Mendieta
johan.description: Software developer with experience in frontend, backend, and microservices architecture. Leading OpenAI-powered solutions with embeddings and semantic search.

juan_vargas.name: Juan Vargas
juan_vargas.description: Full Stack developer specialized in API development, enterprise reporting, and cloud integration with Microsoft 365 and Azure. Expert in chatbots with AI.

juan_pablo.name: Juan Pablo Caicedo
juan_pablo.description: Full Stack developer specialized in web application design, development and deployment. Expert in JavaScript, Microsoft D365, and database management.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: The path that brought us to where we are today

2019.title: Independent Beginnings
2019.description: Colombian development team collaborating with professionals in Mexico. Projects for universities and small businesses.

2021.title: Backend and Systems Projects
2021.description: Java and Python development for e-commerce. Cluster setup and replication on CentOS. Backend-focused systems work.

2022.title: Application of AI
2022.description: Machine learning and deep learning solutions for clients in Costa Rica. HR chatbot development for internal workflows.

2023.title: Official Registration
2023.description: Company formally registered on 03/26/2023. Service portfolio expansion and operational consolidation.

2025.title: Healthcare Sector Project
2025.description: Development of a platform to be presented to the Health Secretariat in Colombia.

time.question: How long does a project take?
time.answer: Depends on scope, but typically 2-12 weeks. We give you precise estimates in the initial consultation.

guarantee.question: Do you offer a guarantee?
guarantee.answer: Yes, 30-day guarantee and continuous support to ensure your total satisfaction.

startups.question: Do you work with startups?
startups.answer: Absolutely. We have special plans for startups and early-stage companies.
